mapper.select: /* selectEggListByFarm */ SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT a.work_seq workSeq , a.serial_no serialNo , a.farm_no farmNo , a.grade grade , (SELECT code_name FROM tb_code WHERE code_group = 'grade' AND code_value = a.grade) gradeName , (SELECT code_ord FROM tb_code WHERE code_group = 'grade' AND code_value = a.grade) gradeOrder , a.prod_ratio prodRatio , a.qntty qntty , a.box box , a.total_weight totalWeight , a.avrg_weight avrgWeight , a.reg_dtm regDtm , a.mod_dtm modDtm FROM tb_egg a WHERE a.work_seq = #{workSeq} AND a.serial_no = #{serialNo} AND a.farm_no = #{farmNo} ) b ORDER BY b.gradeOrder
/* selectHenListById */ SELECT user_id , farm_no , hen_count , ent_dt , reg_dtm , mod_dtm FROM tb_hen WHERE user_id = #{userid} ORDER BY farm_no
/* selectCodeListByCodeGroup */ SELECT code_group , code_name , code_value , code_desc , code_ord FROM tb_code WHERE code_group = #{group} ORDER BY code_ord

SELECT c.work_seq , c.serial_no , c.farm_no , c.input_count , c.reg_dtm , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_hen a, tb_user b WHERE a.user_id = b.user_id AND b.serial_no = c.serial_no) farmCount FROM tb_farm c WHERE c.serial_no = #{serialNo} AND type = #{type} ORDER BY c.work_seq DESC, c.farm_no
